tool_description: Tracks review volume patterns over time, identifying peaks, trends, and seasonal patterns in review submission rates.

aggregation_period.description: Time period for aggregation: daily, weekly, or monthly

detect_anomalies.description: Whether to detect unusual volume spikes or drops

error_messages: Invalid timestamps: All timestamps must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Insufficient data: At least 10 timestamps required for volume analysis.
Invalid aggregation period: Must be one of 'daily', 'weekly', or 'monthly'.
Date range too narrow: Time span must be at least 7 days for meaningful volume tracking.
usage: Provide array of timestamps. Optionally set aggregation_period and detect_anomalies for detailed analysis.

total_volume.description: Total number of reviews in the period

volume_trend.description: Overall trend: increasing, decreasing, or stable
